attributes.action: To force the European Union to sign off on its accounts after 15 years
attributes.additional_details:
The European Union has not signed off on its accounts for the last 15 years. The EU is funded with taxpayer’s moneyand the public have a right to know how our EU contributions are spent.

The Accounts being blocked by EU politicians could mean there is fraud, waste and abuse of EU money and the British people have a right to know about corruption so we can stop it just like the MP expenses scandal. Unlike the MP's expenses scandal the sums of potential fraud within the EU budget is a lot greater.

If you believe in accountable government then you must sign this e-petition
